x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = A -> ( Singleton ` x ) = ( Singleton ` A ) ) |

| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( x = A -> ( ( Singleton ` x ) = { x } <-> ( Singleton ` A ) = { A } ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- { x } = { x } |

| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_mpbir | |- x Singleton { x } |
| 9 |  | #P_fnsingle | |- Singleton Fn _V |
| 10 |  | #P_fnbrfvb | |- ( ( Singleton Fn _V /\ x e. _V ) -> ( ( Singleton ` x ) = { x } <-> x Singleton { x } ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 5, 10 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( Singleton ` x ) = { x } <-> x Singleton { x } ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_mpbir | |- ( Singleton ` x ) = { x } |
